mapper.select: SELECT o.uid, record.id as record_id, income.income_amount, o.amount as settle_amount, record.purchase_time ,record.start_income_time,record.redeem_time, record.coin,record.product_name,record.product_term FROM `order` o INNER JOIN financial_record record on record.id = o.related_id and record.uid = o.uid INNER JOIN financial_income_accrue income ON income.uid = o.uid and income.record_id = record.id WHERE o.uid = #{uid} and record.product_type = #{productType} and o.type = 'settle'
